name: Netflix Clean and Black
description:
I created this style so that when browsing netflix site it is not hard on the eyes.

I set pretty much all the backgrounds to black.  Then the font is orange and I set it so that even when browsing over a movie or using a drop down the themes match.  This is much easier on the eyes.  If I missed something or something is not working send me an email at owngeek@gmai.com
